summary: To the residents of Moraine, Ohio, General Motors was more than just a car company, it was the lifeblood of a community. In the wake of GM's 2008 announcement that it was closing the plant,... See full summary »
cast: Popeye Hurst|Kim Clay|Kate Geiger|Kathe Day|Joyce Gilbert|Louis Carter|Darlene Henson|Rick Stacy|Kevin Claypool|Dana Baker|Dave Harris
title: El último coche: adiós a la General Motors
